Hello! My name Is Sam Vong and this is my excel review sheet which will display my excel skills. 
Each Sheet down below will have different formating conditions.  
Within each sheet, there will be a log of steps of creating the formatting conditions. 
Hover over the red tab on the top right of cells to see notes about the page and the setup. 
Currently, I am using Excel Web, due to a lack of options, 
I will include some incomplete formatting conditions but will explain an explanation of how the formatting will work 
(The incomplete Sheet will have an "!").
